hero.description: BeAFox is an independent, playful learning platform for financial education for young people‚Äîfocused on unbiased knowledge and developed especially for schools and training companies.

useCasesSection.subtitle: Discover tailored solutions for individuals, businesses, schools, and clubs‚Äîbuilt for every need

unlimited.title: BeAFox Unlimited
unlimited.description: The premium version for anyone who wants to take their financial education to the next level.

business.title: BeAFox for Business
business.description: Empower your team with professional financial education and position yourself as a responsible employer.

schools.title: BeAFox for Schools
schools.description: Enhance your classes with playful financial education that inspires students and creates lasting impact.

partners.title: BeAFox for Clubs
partners.description: Join our network and strengthen your community with valuable financial education.

anytime.title: Learn anytime
anytime.text: Learn whenever and wherever you want‚Äîon your phone on the go, on your laptop at home, or on your tablet during a break. BeAFox fits into your everyday life. Your progress is synced automatically so you can switch devices seamlessly.

school.title: Learning at school
school.text: BeAFox is built for classroom use. Teachers can track class progress and start playful competitions. This way, financial education can be taught even beyond the standard curriculum.

training.title: Learning in training companies
training.text: Apprentices get practical financial education they can apply directly in everyday work. Companies can support young talent and show they care about their apprentices‚Äô financial future.

clubs.title: Learning for clubs
clubs.text: Clubs and organizations can offer valuable financial education to their members‚Äîsports clubs, youth centers, or nonprofits. BeAFox helps strengthen young people financially and teaches essential life skills.

stufen.title: Levels
stufen.description: Choose freely what you want to learn. Our level structure gives you the flexibility to explore topics based on your interests and needs. Whether you're a beginner or advanced, you'll find the right level and can learn at your own pace.

lernpfad.title: Learning path
lernpfad.description: Follow a structured learning path that guides you step by step through the most important financial topics. You always know where you stand and what comes next. The learning path visualizes your progress and helps you stay on track.

lektion.title: Lessons
lektion.description: Learn step by step everything you need to know about finance. Our interactive lessons make complex topics easy to understand‚Äîfrom budgeting and saving to investing. We cover all the essentials and combine videos, text, and interactive elements.

quiz.title: Quiz
quiz.description: After theory comes practice. Test your knowledge with interactive quizzes and deepen what you've learned. With instant feedback, you learn from mistakes and can review targeted topics. Every successful quiz earns points and boosts your ranking.

rangliste.title: Leaderboard
rangliste.description: Compare yourself with other learners and stay motivated through friendly competition. Collect points, reach new levels, and become a finance expert. Different categories and timeframes ensure everyone has a fair shot at the top.

missionen.title: Missions & goals
missionen.description: Complete exciting missions and reach your personal goals. Missions range from daily challenges to long-term goals. Each completed mission is rewarded and brings you closer to your bigger goals. Set your own goals or follow predefined missions.

profil.title: Profile
profil.description: Track your learning progress and get your personal Fox Score. Your profile shows all achievements: completed lessons, points earned, and passed quizzes. The Fox Score is your personal indicator of financial knowledge and grows with every step.

items.title: Financial education as a future skill
items.text: Finance is becoming more complex‚Äîand more important. In a fast-changing world, financial competence is a key future skill that prepares young people for tomorrow‚Äôs challenges.

items.title: Financial education as a success factor
items.text: Studies show financially educated people are more successful in life, at work, and beyond. Financial knowledge isn‚Äôt just a bonus‚Äîit‚Äôs a crucial factor for personal and professional growth.

items.title: Equal opportunities
items.text: Everyone should have the same chance to learn about money‚Äîregardless of background or family resources. BeAFox supports equal opportunities with accessible, neutral financial education for all.

cta.description: With our learning app, we‚Äôve finally created a way to teach finance in a sustainable and easy-to-understand way‚Äîwithout it feeling boring. We want the next generation to learn financial knowledge independently and with motivation.

posts.excerpt: We‚Äôre proud to have won the Deggendorfer Gr√ºnderpreis! Despite nerves and a last-minute pitch update, our work paid off‚Äîaround 60% of the audience voted for us. After two years of hard work, it shows that perseverance, courage, and teamwork pay off. Thanks to Volksbank am W√ºrttemberg eG for this great event!

hero.description: BeAFox is a community where young people learn about finance together. These guidelines help us create a safe, respectful, and supportive learning environment.

items.title: Respectful behavior
items.description: Treat all members of the BeAFox community with respect and kindness.
rules: Be respectful and polite in all interactions
Avoid insulting, discriminatory, or demeaning language
Respect different opinions and experiences
Help others learn instead of criticizing them
Celebrate others' successes and encourage their progress

items.title: Constructive communication
items.description: Share knowledge constructively and help others learn.
rules: Ask questions when you don't understand something
Share your experiences and tips with the community
Give constructive feedback that helps others
Avoid spam, advertising, or unwanted content
Keep discussions factual and on topic

items.title: Safety and privacy
items.description: Protect your personal data and the data of other users.
rules: Do not share personal financial data or account information
Do not share passwords or login details
Respect other users' privacy
Report suspicious activities or content
Use strong passwords for your account

items.title: Honesty and integrity
items.description: Be honest in your interactions and while learning.
rules: Do not use cheating methods or exploits
Do not share false information
Respect others' learning progress
Only share information you understand yourself
Cite sources when sharing information

items.title: Age-appropriate content
items.description: BeAFox is for young people ‚Äî keep content age-appropriate.
rules: Use appropriate language for all age groups
Avoid inappropriate or offensive content
Remember that many users are minors
Keep discussions educational and constructive
Report inappropriate content immediately

items.title: No financial advice
items.description: BeAFox provides education, not individual financial advice.
rules: BeAFox is a learning platform, not a financial advisor
Do not give specific investment recommendations
Refer to professional advice for complex questions
Share knowledge, not personal financial decisions
Remind others that individual advice can be important

violations.title: Violations of the guidelines
violations.description: If these community guidelines are violated, we may take the following actions:
actions: Warning and request to change behavior
Reporting illegal activities to the authorities

contact.title: Questions about our guidelines?
contact.text: If you have questions about our community guidelines or want to report a violation, feel free to contact us.
